task.title: Merge Group
task.shortdesc: Merge multiple word groups into a single word group.

step.cmd: Position the cursor inside a group in the Orthography tier which you would like to merge with a following group.
Click the Merge group with next button in the Record Data view, or select the View Record Data Merge group with next (OPT/ALT+G) menu item.
step.stepresult: The adjacent groups will be merged into a single group, with a space between the original contents.
